topic.title: Connect Yeastar TA Gateway
topic.shortdesc: Follow the steps to connect Yeastar TA1600/2400/3200 FXS VoIP gateway.

li.b: Connect TA gateway to the Internet
li.p: LAN port can be connected to router or PBX.

li.b: Connect TA gateway to analog phones
li.p: FXS ports can be connected to analog phones.
Connect one end of the power cord to the gatewayâ€™s power port; plug the other end into an electrical outlet.
